sense.def: Pathological Condition of a feng 風② , wind, as poisoning by medication prepared from cinnabar [et al.] minerals. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry ning shui shi 凝水石：寒水石，能壓丹石毒風，去 心煩渴悶，解傷寒復勞 , “ Han shui shi is capable of suppressing cinnabar [et al.] mineral poison wind . It removes heart vexation with thirst and heart-pressure. It dissolves harm caused by cold and restores [those suffering from] exhaustion”.
